ace-constitution-system.description: High-confidence coding principle aggregation and documentation

python-error-handling-patterns.description: Python exception handling best practices tracking

pattern-lifecycle-management.description: Pattern addition, update, and removal based on confidence thresholds

living-documentation.description: Self-updating documentation that evolves with codebase patterns

evidence-based-standards.description: Coding standards derived from actual usage rather than imposed top-down

transparent-confidence-tracking.description: Explicit confidence scores and observation counts for pattern credibility

graceful-pattern-degradation.description: Lazy pruning allows patterns to persist temporarily below minimum threshold
